content.text: Hello, I want to source bags and fashion accessories for my brand in Nigeria. But I want to understand - how is using Sourcy different from me just ordering directly from Alibaba? What do I get?

content.thinking: Great question about Sourcy vs Alibaba.

content.text:
Great question — it's one we get a lot.

With Alibaba, you're browsing listings from trading companies (middlemen) who mark up factory prices 20-40%. You also handle QC, shipping, and disputes yourself.

With Sourcy, we go *direct to factories* — so you get better pricing, plus we handle quality checks before shipment and manage logistics to Nigeria (Lagos port or door-to-door DDP).

For bags specifically — are you looking at leather, PU leather, or canvas? And do you have a reference photo or style in mind? That'll help me give you real price ranges right away.
PU leather crossbody bags and tote bags. I have some designs on my Instagram @chiclagos. Budget is about 2 million naira. Want maybe 500-1000 pieces mixed

Good taste — PU leather crossbody and totes are hot right now, and those quantities work well for factory direct.

Let me break it down for you:

- *Crossbody bags (PU leather):* $3-6/unit depending on hardware, lining, and closure type
- *Tote bags (PU leather):* $2-5/unit depending on size and structure (structured totes cost more)
- *Custom logo/branding:* adds $0.30-0.80/unit (debossed, printed, or metal tag)

Your 2M naira (~$1,300 USD) across 500-1000 pieces puts you at roughly $1.30-2.60/unit — that's tight for PU leather with custom designs. Realistically you'd need closer to *$2,000-4,000 USD* (3-6M naira) for that quantity range with good quality.

Being honest upfront so there's no surprise later — would you be open to adjusting the budget or starting with a smaller first order (say 200-300 pieces of your best-selling style) to test the market first?
Ok let me start with 200 pieces of crossbody bags. My budget can stretch to 3 million naira for that. My name is Chioma, chioma@chiclagos.com. Please send me quotes

Perfect, Chioma — 200 crossbody bags at ~$2,000 USD budget works much better. That's around $10/unit which gives room for good quality PU leather with custom branding.

Here's what I've got:

- *Product:* PU leather crossbody bags, custom designs
- *Quantity:* 200 pieces
- *Budget:* ~$10/unit ($2,000 USD total)
- *Customization:* Custom designs (reference: @chiclagos on Instagram)
- *Delivery to:* Lagos, Nigeria
- *Contact:* chioma@chiclagos.com

Two quick things before I send this to our sourcing team:

Do you have a target timeline — when do you need these in hand? (Production is typically 15-25 days + sea freight to Lagos ~30 days, so about 2 months total)
